NG0717:1: ar+ya ni lam ba ra badzra pa ni a ha
NG0717:2: ya k+sha se na pa ti badzra sha wa ra
NG0717:5: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'phags pa lag
NG0717:6: na rdo rje gos sngon po can rdo rje rtse
NG0717:7: mo zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po //
NG0717:8: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
NG0717:9: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes rdo rje
NG0717:10: brjid pa'i sbyor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
NG0717:11: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
NG0717:12: ting nge 'dzin la de snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu /
NG0717:13: byang chub sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin zhes
NG0717:14: bya bas stan las langs te 'di skad ces gsol
NG0717:15: lo // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
NG0717:16: cad kyi rdo rje brjid pa'i sbyor ba mthong ni
NG0717:17: lo // mthong lags na / sbyor ba 'di ni
NG0717:18: sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba thams cad
NG0717:19: kyi 'chi 'pho ba thams cad bzlog par bgyid pa
NG0717:20: lo // mthong lags na / / 'byung po thams cad kyi snying gnon pa /
NG0717:21: 'byung po thams cad las rgyal bar bgyid pa /
NG0717:22: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung po thams cad 'gugs pa'i dam tshig gi sbyor ba dang *//
NG0717:23: rdo rje brjod pa'i sbyor ba bdag la bshad du gsol /
NG0717:24: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin pa dang *//
NG0717:25: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis de skad gsol to //
NG0717:26: lha thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to //
NG0717:27: gang gis 'byung po thams cad bzlog bgyid cing *//
NG0717:28: dus min 'chi ba kun las grol byed pa //
NG0717:29: rdo rje drag po'i las dang bsam gtan dag / 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams la bshad du gsol //
NG0717:30: de skad ces gsol pa dang *//
NG0717:31: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag po
NG0717:32: 'phags pa gos sngon po can gyis 'di skad ces
NG0717:33: gsungs so // rdo rje drag po'i sbyor ba 'di ni /
NG0717:34: 'byung po thams cad bzlog par bgyid ba /
NG0717:35: 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par bgyid pa /
NG0717:36: 'byung po thams cad skrod par bgyid pa /
NG0717:37: rig sngags kyi mthu chen po thob par bgyid pa /
NG0717:38: ngan 'gro thams cad las bzlog par
NG0717:41: 'byung po'i rig sngags thams cad 'joms par byed pa yin /
NG0717:42: sems rtse gcig tu bsdus la legs par nyon cig / sangs rgyas mar me mdzad la sogs //
NG0717:43: kun gyis bstan par ma gyur pa'i //
NG0717:44: rig sngags bsrung dang 'gugs pa dang *//
NG0717:45: de yi las ni 'di yin te //
NG0717:46: stong la mos pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NG0717:47: bdag gi phyag rgya rab gnas te //
NG0717:48: snying khar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng *//
NG0717:49: 'bar ba'i yi ge hum dang ldan //
NG0717:52: 'dus pa'i dbang dang ldan gyur nas //
NG0717:54: hum kro d+ha badzra sa ma ya hum /
NG0717:55: 'di gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyis sangs rgyas
NG0717:56: dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis
NG0717:58: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes sku gsung
NG0717:59: thugs gsang ba pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
NG0717:60: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
NG0717:61: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu /
NG0717:62: sku gsung thugs rdo rje gsang ba mchog gi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:64: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:65: om sarba ta tha ga ta ka ya wa ka tsit+ta gu h+ya sa ma ya hum /
NG0717:66: 'di gsungs ma thag tu phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi
NG0717:67: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad nyid
NG0717:68: kyi thugs kar zhugs par gyur to //
NG0717:69: de'i tshe 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon
NG0717:70: po can gyi sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba las
NG0717:71: sprul pa dang */ yang sprul dang */
NG0717:72: tsha tsha khrug par gyur to //
NG0717:73: thog chen po rnam pa lnga'ang 'bab par gyur to //
NG0717:74: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyis //
NG0717:75: mngon par spro ba'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te /
NG0717:76: gsang ba mngon par spro ba'i byed pa zhes bya ba'-i sngags 'di //
NG0717:77: nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang */
NG0717:78: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:79: om sarba ta tha ga ta ka ya wa ka
NG0717:80: tsit+ta dz+nya na gu h+ya na badzra kro d+ha ni
NG0717:81: lam wa gar hum phat phat /
NG0717:83: 'di gsungs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
NG0717:84: khams mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad khro bo'i
NG0717:85: dkyil 'khor gyis gang bar gyur to //
NG0717:86: de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'ur 'ur /
NG0717:89: rnam par dma' ba'i bar du'o //
NG0717:90: de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'di'i bdud
NG0717:91: dang bdud kyi ris kyi 'byung po thams cad dang
NG0717:92: */ ma mo las gyur ba'i bar du g.yos par gyur to //
NG0717:93: de'i tshe 'khor gyi nang nas nor lha'i bus gsol ba /
NG0717:94: sgeg po dpa' bo 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
NG0717:95: khyod mthong pas ni bdag cag 'jigs //
NG0717:96: yod min med pa ma yin nas //
NG0717:97: mnar med pa la thug gi bar //
NG0717:98: khyod kyi sgra yang thos kyi bar //
NG0717:99: 'jigs shing skying bung rab byed pas //
NG0717:102: mngon par rtogs pa'i 'khor lo bskor //
NG0717:103: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
NG0717:105: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje g.yo ba med pa'i ngang la gnas par gyur to //
NG0717:106: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bsdu ba'i
NG0717:107: thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te
NG0717:108: // de'i tshe gsang ba'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:110: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:111: om sarba ta tha ga ta badzra sa nan dza /
NG0717:113: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus par gyur to //
NG0717:114: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus par gyur nas //
NG0717:115: la la ni dpal rdo rje gos sngon can du gyur te /
NG0717:117: la la ni rin chen gos sngon can du gyur te /
NG0717:119: la la ni dpal pad+ma gos sngon can du gyur te /
NG0717:121: la la ni las kyi khro bor gyur te /
NG0717:123: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
NG0717:124: stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na //
NG0717:126: gsang ba bdag po'i sprul pa'i sku //
NG0717:127: thams cad 'di las gzhan du min //
NG0717:129: de nas 'khor rnams gyi nang nas byang chub sems
NG0717:130: dpa' rin chen tog ces bya ba des 'di skad
NG0717:131: ces gsol to // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag / yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas //
NG0717:132: bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po mchog / bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol //
NG0717:133: de skad ces gsol ma thag tu /
NG0717:134: phyag na rdo rjes gti mug rnam par 'joms pa
NG0717:135: zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
NG0717:136: // khro bo rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:138: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:139: om sarba ta tha ga ta badzra kro d+ha ni lam ba ra hum /
NG0717:140: 'di gsungs ma thag tu gti mug thams cad rnam par dag par gyur to //
NG0717:141: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes nga rgyal
NG0717:142: rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
NG0717:144: rin po che'i rigs kyi khro bo gos sngon po'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:146: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:147: om sarba ta tha ga ta radan kro d+ha ni lam ba ra hum /
NG0717:148: 'di gsungs ma thag tu nga rgyal thams cad rnam par dag par gyur to //
NG0717:149: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes 'dod chags
NG0717:150: kyis 'ching ba sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
NG0717:152: pad+ma'i rigs kyi khro bo gos sngon po can gyi sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:154: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:155: om sarba ta tha ga ta pad+ma kro d+ha ni lam ba ra hum /
NG0717:156: 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag par gyur to //
NG0717:157: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes phrag dog
NG0717:158: yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
NG0717:160: las kyi rigs kyi khro bo gos sngon po can gyi sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:162: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:163: om sarba ta tha ga ta karma kro d+ha ni lam ba ra hum /
NG0717:164: 'di gsungs ma thag tu phrag dog thams cad rnam par dag par gyur to //
NG0717:165: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes 'dod chags
NG0717:166: chen po'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
NG0717:168: rdo rje chung ma'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:170: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:171: om ni lam ba ra badzra kro d+hi shwa ri hum /
NG0717:172: om ni lam ba ra badzra radan kro d+hi shwa ri hum /
NG0717:173: om ni lam ba ra pad+ma kri d+hi shwa ri hum /
NG0717:174: om ni lam ba ra karma kro d+hi shwa ri hum /
NG0717:175: 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'phags pa phyogs bzhi'i khro
NG0717:176: bo thams cad 'dod chags chen pos tshim par 'gyur
NG0717:177: ro // de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan
NG0717:178: thos yang dag par song ba la sogs pa thams
NG0717:179: cad bred sha thon nas mig bgrad te /
NG0717:180: bred pa'i stobs kyis gom pa gya tshom du 'dor bar byed do //
NG0717:181: de'i tshe de dag thams cad brgyal bar gyur to //
NG0717:182: mkha' 'gro ma dang srin po la sogs pa thams
NG0717:183: cad shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyis stan las langs
NG0717:184: te / thal mo sbyar nas phyag byed /
NG0717:185: bskor ba byed ngo mtshar gyis dga' bas bstod pa'i bar du byed do //
NG0717:186: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes /
NG0717:187: khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba la bltas
NG0717:188: pas go bar gyur nas dril bu'i sgras brgyal ba
NG0717:189: bsrang ste / dran pa slar rnyed nas /
NG0717:192: 'dod chags dang bral bdag nyid kyang *//
NG0717:193: ma yin spyod pa ma mdzad par //
NG0717:194: rtag tu yang dag chos la spyod //
NG0717:197: dngos por gyur pa'i chos rnams ni //
NG0717:198: rang bzhin nyid kyis rnam pa dag / thams cad dag par sems can la //
NG0717:199: chags dang ma chags gnyis las 'das //
NG0717:200: dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so //
NG0717:202: 'dod chags nyid kyis rnam par dag / dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med phyir //
NG0717:203: thabs dang shes rab 'brel par snang *//
NG0717:205: de nas 'phags pa rdo rje gos sngon gyis gsol pa /
NG0717:206: gti mug dang bral 'dod chags sbyor ba 'dis //
NG0717:207: ma chags de yi ngang yang mi dmigs so //
NG0717:208: dbyings dang ye shes 'brel pas rdo rje pad+mar 'brel //
NG0717:209: sbrul pa'i sku 'byung chos dbyings b+ha gas mtshon par byed //
NG0717:211: de nas 'phags pa rin chen gos sngon gyis gsol pa /
NG0717:212: nga rgyal rnam par dag pas yon tan thams cad 'byung *//
NG0717:213: legs sbyangs btsun mo bsten pas yon tan thams cad phob //
NG0717:214: 'dod chags nyid na ma chags bde ba ngang gis skye //
NG0717:215: de rten 'bras bu sangs rgyas byang chub sa la reg / ces gsungs so //
NG0717:216: de nas pad+ma gos sngon gyis gsol pa //
NG0717:219: de ni 'dam gyi skyon gyis gos pa med //
NG0717:220: de bzhin btsun mo rnams la mang rten kyang *//
NG0717:221: 'od chags rnam par dag pas gos mi 'gyur //
NG0717:223: de nas las kyi gos sngon gyis gsol ba /
NG0717:224: thugs rje smon lam shugs kyis sems can mngon sum na //
NG0717:225: khro mo yum dang gnyis med sbyor zhing chags pa'i tshul //
NG0717:226: sems can 'dod la dga' ba bla med lam la
NG0717:227: 'jug / tha dad rtog dang bral bas chags pa
NG0717:229: de skad ces gsungs ma thag tu 'dus pa chen po'i 'khor thams cad yid rab tu dga' ste /
NG0717:230: ngo mtshar gyi dga' bas bstod pa /
NG0717:231: rigs rnams kun gyi bdag po ste /
NG0717:232: rigs kyi khro bo kun gyi ngang *//
NG0717:233: rtag tu mya ngan 'das pa las //
NG0717:234: sems can don byed phyag 'tshal bstod //
NG0717:235: gti mug mun pa dang bral zhing *//
NG0717:236: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes gsal //
NG0717:237: dkar la mdzes pa'i sku ston pa //
NG0717:238: 'dod chags rnam dag khyod la bstod //
NG0717:239: ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu las //
NG0717:242: bde ba thob pa phyag 'tshal bstod //
NG0717:244: 'dam gyi skyon gyis mi gos ltar //
NG0717:245: 'dod chags che la rab gnas kyang *//
NG0717:246: log rtog skyon med khyod la bstod //
NG0717:247: ji ltar shes rab ral gri yis //
NG0717:248: rtog pa'i dra ba rab gcod cing *//
NG0717:249: 'dod chags can rnams bde la dgod //
NG0717:250: sna tshogs don mdzad khyod la bstod //
NG0717:251: ces gsungs nas thams cad lhan to //
NG0717:252: de nas 'phags pa gos sngon can gyis //
NG0717:253: sku'i phyag rgya chen po yongs su rdzogs pa rdo
NG0717:254: rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
NG0717:255: zhugs te // 'di skad ces gsungs so //
NG0717:256: dkar dmar mthing kha ljang khu'i zhal //
NG0717:257: 'od zer bye ba stong dang ldan //
NG0717:258: shar phyogs rgyal rigs gdeng ka can //
NG0717:259: lho yi khro bos rje 'us brgyan //
NG0717:260: nub kyi bram ze'i gdeng ka can //
NG0717:261: byang phyogs dmangs rigs gdeng kas ldan //
NG0717:263: rgya gram g.yas na bsnams pa ste //
NG0717:264: ston pa'i phyag na dril bu bsnams //
NG0717:265: gos sngon po yi sham thabs can //
NG0717:266: so so'i khro mo chen mo ni //
NG0717:267: g.yas pa'i dril bu thugs kar bstan //
NG0717:268: g.yon pa ban dmar khrag chen stobs //
NG0717:271: sems can nyen par ldan pa dag / 'di yi ming tsam thos pa na //
NG0717:272: sgra skad thos pas smos ci dgos //
NG0717:273: gal te bka' las 'das gyur na //
NG0717:274: rnam par snang mdzad nyid kyang 'chi //
NG0717:276: de nas yang 'phags pa gos sngon po can gyis /
NG0717:277: rin po che mngon par 'grub pa rdo rje zhes
NG0717:278: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
NG0717:280: ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
NG0717:283: don dang yi ge gnyis su 'brel //
NG0717:284: bsgoms bas log rtog dra ba gcod //
NG0717:285: ces gsungs so /    / de nas 'dus pa chen po'i 'khor de dag gi nang nas /
NG0717:286: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba
NG0717:287: sprin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bstan las langs
NG0717:288: te thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad gsol to //
NG0717:289: e ma ho sangs rgyas bcomaldan 'das //
NG0717:290: sgrib pa grol ba'i thabs mnga' zhing *//
NG0717:291: log rtog dra ba thams cad gcod //
NG0717:292: gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig tshul //
NG0717:293: bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol //
NG0717:295: 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
NG0717:296: legs so legs so legs par gsungs //
NG0717:297: kun nas 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir //
NG0717:298: gang dag nyon mongs sel ba'i thabs //
NG0717:299: bdud rtsi chu bo'i rgyun 'dra ba //
NG0717:300: ngas ni khyod la bshad par bya //
NG0717:301: sems can thams cad ma lus la //
NG0717:302: sgo nga'i tshul dang yang dag ldan //
NG0717:303: bcod pa'i rtsal gri chen po yis //
NG0717:304: dngos po'i sgo nga'i sbubs rnams 'byed //
NG0717:305: ji ltar shel sgo 'dam bcug la //
NG0717:306: dag pa'i chu yis 'khru ba bzhin //
NG0717:308: bla med thar pa'i lam gyi mchog / bdud rtsi'i chu yis 'khru bar byed //
NG0717:309: yang dag rdzogs dang rab ldan pas //
NG0717:310: bdud rtsi'i chu bo rgyun byung ba //
NG0717:311: de yi bsam pa'i rim pa ni //
NG0717:312: dang por yi ge om dkar las //
NG0717:313: 'od byung khams gsum thams cad khyab //
NG0717:314: slar 'dus om gyi dbyings su bstim //
NG0717:315: de las 'od byung sangs rgyas rnams //
NG0717:316: bskul nas sbyor ba'i byang chub sems //
NG0717:317: phab pas lus kyi bag chags rnams //
NG0717:318: dag par gyur bsam rdo rje bzhin //
NG0717:319: gnas nas spyi bo gtsug nas byung *//
NG0717:320: gnyis pa'i yi ge a dmar las //
NG0717:322: slar 'dus a yi dbyings su thim //
NG0717:323: de las 'od byung gong ma bzhin //
NG0717:324: gnas ni mgrin pa'i dkyil nas 'byung *//
NG0717:325: gsum pa'i yi ge hum mthing gis //
NG0717:327: lus ngag sems kyi sgrib pa dag / bsam gtan brtan par myur du 'byung *//
NG0717:328: mchog dang thun mong kun gyi rgyu //
NG0717:329: gang zhig bsam gtan 'di ldan nas //
NG0717:330: gzhogs skams pa dang yan lag na //
NG0717:331: de la sogs pa kun las grol //
NG0717:332: snying khar chu skyes rab bsams te //
NG0717:333: dbus su thig le dkar po bsam //
NG0717:334: mtha' mar dang pa'-i yi ge brgyad //
NG0717:335: ci rigs gsal nas so so yi //
NG0717:336: thig ler gyur te rang bzhin med //
NG0717:337: des ni sdug bsngal zhi bar 'gyur //
NG0717:339: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi rgyud rdo rje rtse mo las //
NG0717:340: gtan la phab pa'i rtog pa ste le'u dang po'o
NG0717:341: // // de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje
NG0717:343: rdo rje gsang ba zhi ba sbyor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms @#//
NG0717:346: ji ltar zhi ba'i las rnams dag / zhi ba'i sbyor ba thams cad kyi //
NG0717:347: thabs bzhan 'di las bzhan na med //
NG0717:348: 'di ni zhi ba'i sbyor ba mchog / om badzra
NG0717:349: pa ni hum ni lam ba ra shan+ti ku ru
NG0717:350: swa ha de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje
NG0717:352: rdo rje rgyas par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te //
NG0717:354: gser dang nyi ma'i sbyor ba yis //
NG0717:355: tshad med bzhi yi 'bras bu la //
NG0717:356: rgyas par byas na rgyas par 'gyur //
NG0717:357: om badzra pa ni hum ni lam ba ra rat+na push+tam ku ru ho //
NG0717:358: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje //
NG0717:359: rdo rje dbang gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
NG0717:361: bye ru tshul gyi sbyor ba yis //
NG0717:362: zla gam ba yi dbyibs 'dra la //
NG0717:363: dbang du byas na dbang du 'gyur //
NG0717:365: om badzra pa ni hum ni lam ba ra hum /
NG0717:366: pa sham ku ru hum phat /
NG0717:367: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes /
NG0717:368: gsang ba'i rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
NG0717:370: dug dang sol ba 'dres pa la //
NG0717:371: b+ha ga'i dbyibs su rab byas te //
NG0717:372: gsad pa byas na gsad pa 'grub //
NG0717:374: om na ma badzra pa ni hum /
NG0717:375: ni lam ba ra ma ra ya /
NG0717:376: na sha ya na sha ya hum phat /
NG0717:377: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi rgyud rdo rje rtse mo las //
NG0717:378: gtan la dbab pa'i le'u gnyis pa'o ///
NG0717:379: / de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyis /
NG0717:380: rdo rje ma'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
NG0717:382: rab tu brtags pa'i gnas chen du //
NG0717:383: las bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rnam bzhi la //
NG0717:384: rigs bzhi'i shing gis khrir byas te //
NG0717:385: zhal du gyur dang me bos la //
NG0717:386: ram zhes bya bas me spar te //
NG0717:387: mchod dang bstod pa dbul ba ni //
NG0717:388: dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi bdag nyid can //
NG0717:389: gang dmigs dngos po gang yang 'grub //
NG0717:390: thogs pa med pa rdo rje bzhin //
NG0717:392: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes /
NG0717:393: drang ba sbyor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
NG0717:395: phyag rgya gsum gyi bdag nyid can //
NG0717:396: spyi bo zla ba'i gdan stengs su //
NG0717:397: bam las byung ba'i chu rgyun bsam //
NG0717:398: lus rnams shin tu bsil 'gyur che'o //
NG0717:399: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes *//
NG0717:400: mi g.yo ba bsgrub pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
NG0717:401: yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'brug sgra sprin gyi rgyal pos gsol ba //
NG0717:402: bcom ldan 'das mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin lhun grub kyang */
NG0717:403: thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
NG0717:404: dngos po'i sku ru rab bzhengs la //
NG0717:405: yang dag bdud rtsi gsal du gsol //
NG0717:408: bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te /
NG0717:410: om na mo ni lam ba ra hum /
NG0717:411: che ge mo ku ru bam /
NG0717:412: om sarba ta tha ga ta ka ya pa ka tsit+ta /
NG0717:414: ku ru kha kha ha ha /
NG0717:418: na sha ya na sha ya /
NG0717:421: ma ra ya ma ra ya /
NG0717:422: hum phat na ga ba twan stan pa ni hum phat /
NG0717:423: na ga ra dza pa ra bid dwan ban+d+ha ban+d+ha /
NG0717:425: zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so //
NG0717:426: de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo yangs bzang po
NG0717:427: 'brug sgra sprin gyi rgyal pos thal mo sbyar te
NG0717:428: / phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
NG0717:429: kye ma phyag na rdo rje chen po //
NG0717:430: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gnang ba /
NG0717:431: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs thams cad thob pa //
NG0717:432: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ste /
NG0717:433: 'di'i gzungs 'di ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba /
NG0717:436: thams cad kyi las thogs pa med par mdzad pa /
NG0717:437: mngon par shes pa thams cad myur du thob par byed pa /
NG0717:438: 'byung po thams cad kyi rig sngags gcod pa /
NG0717:439: 'byung po thams cad kyi snying snon pa /
NG0717:440: log par lta ba thams cad myur du 'gugs par byed pa /
NG0717:441: klu thams cad rlag par byed pa /
NG0717:442: mthu chen po myur du 'byung ba'o //
NG0717:443: byang chub sems dpa' blo yangs zab mo 'brug sgrogs
NG0717:444: sprin gyi rgyal pos de skad ces gsol ma thag
NG0717:445: tu / byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis kyang 'di skad ces gsungs so //
NG0717:446: gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje mthu chen thob //
NG0717:447: yang dag bstan pa'i gzungs 'di shin tu mthu dang rdzu 'phrul che //
NG0717:448: gang zhig 'dzin pa la ni yon tan thams cad ldan //
NG0717:449: legs pa'i don sgrub rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
NG0717:451: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje bstan pa zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
NG0717:452: kye ma bcom ldan 'das 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa dang */
NG0717:454: dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga bdag cag la stsal du gsol /
NG0717:455: de skad ces gsol ma thag tu /
NG0717:457: dbang du sdud pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
NG0717:458: sbyor ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:460: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:461: om sarba big+h+nan ma ra ya ban d+ha ban d+ha badzra bam d+ha hum phat //
NG0717:462: na mo po ta ku ru sa ma ya hum phat /
NG0717:464: de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa rdo rje zhes bya ba des bstod pa /
NG0717:465: gsang ba'i bdag po gos sngon can //
NG0717:467: thogs med rdo rje'i don ldan pa //
NG0717:470: de nas khro bo nam mkha' lding nye bar 'joms
NG0717:471: pa rdo rje zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces
NG0717:473: ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams na ma rungs pa'i
NG0717:474: klu thams cad kyis sems can rnams la 'tshe bar
NG0717:477: 'di dag 'joms pa'i thabs kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba bdag la bstan du gsol /
NG0717:478: de skad gsol ma thag tu /
NG0717:479: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes dag pa
NG0717:480: sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
NG0717:481: par zhugs so // ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
NG0717:482: dag par byed ba bdud rtsi'i rgyun zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang */
NG0717:483: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:484: om sarba ta tha ga ta na ga ra dza sa ma ya hum /
NG0717:485: swa b+ha ba shud+ha sarba d+harma swa b+ha bi shud d+ho\u0f85 ham /
NG0717:487: de nas yang 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes /
NG0717:488: rdo rje sreg par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
NG0717:489: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs nas /
NG0717:490: sreg par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:492: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:493: om na mo ni lam ba ra hum /
NG0717:494: sarba na ga ra dza rak+sha rak+sha /
NG0717:499: stong gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
NG0717:500: cad du rdo rje me yis khyab par gyur to
NG0717:501: // de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos
NG0717:502: sngon po can gyi cho 'phrul rnam par 'byung ba
NG0717:503: rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
NG0717:504: // par zhugs so // ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu /
NG0717:505: cho 'phrul sbyor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:507: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:508: om badzra pa ni ma ha ya ka se na pa ta ye /
NG0717:509: badzra kro d+ha ni lam ba ra hum /
NG0717:510: na ga grih+na grih+na hum phat /
NG0717:511: na ga ha na ha na hum phat /
NG0717:512: na ga ra k+sha s+pho ta s+pho ta hum phat /
NG0717:513: na ga ni na ga ni sum ba ku+u ru hum phat /
NG0717:514: om ni lam ku ru ba ya b+ha ga ban hum phat /
NG0717:515: na ga ni ni bi na sha ka ra ya hum phat /
NG0717:516: om gardza gardza na ga gardza hum phat /
NG0717:517: om tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha na ga yak+sha tshin+d+ha hum phat /
NG0717:518: om ba ling ni twa sa ma ya hum phat /
NG0717:519: om hu lu hu lu na ga hu lu hum phat /
NG0717:520: om tish+tha tish+tha na ga tish+tha hum phat /
NG0717:521: om ku ru ku ru na ga pa sham ku ru hum phat /
NG0717:522: om ban d+ha ban d+ha na ga ra dza sarba bi ban+d+ha hum phat /
NG0717:524: de nas khro bo nam mkha' lding nye bar 'joms pas /
NG0717:525: 'phags pa gos sngon po can la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod do //
NG0717:526: kye ma rdo rje gos sngon can //
NG0717:530: 'khor thams cad la de dag gi sngags 'di brjod do //
NG0717:531: e ma ho gzungs chen po 'di dag ni /
NG0717:534: klu thams cad rlag par byed pa /
NG0717:535: klu ma rungs pa thams cad 'gugs par byed pa /
NG0717:536: klu'i rgyal po thams cad dbang du 'du bar byed na /
NG0717:537: kha rlangs kyi nam mkha'i sprin thams @#//
NG0717:539: rgya mtsho thams cad 'khrug par byed pa /
NG0717:540: klu'i rgyal pos byas pa'i rig sngags la sogs pa gcog cing 'ching bar byed pa ste /
NG0717:541: kye ma gzungs 'di ni 'di ltar mthu che ba /
NG0717:542: 'di ltar bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'o zhes bstod do //
NG0717:543: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba stan las langs te /
NG0717:544: thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
NG0717:545: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems
NG0717:546: can gyi ris thams cad la lha'i gdon du gyur
NG0717:547: pa thams cad kyis bgegs bgyid //
NG0717:550: srog dang bral bar bgyid de //
NG0717:551: 'di gang gis bzlog pa'i cho ga bdag la bstan du gsol //
NG0717:552: de skad ces gsol ma thag tu /
NG0717:554: rdo rje brjid pa sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
NG0717:555: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu /
NG0717:556: steng gi khro bo 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:558: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:559: om de ba mu la pa ti hum /
NG0717:560: om de ba ra dza hum /
NG0717:561: om de ba ra dza ni lam ba ra ma ha yak+sha se na pa ti hum /
NG0717:562: sarba de ba ra dza gardza gardza hum phat /
NG0717:563: sarba de ba ra dza s+pho ta s+pho ta hum phat /
NG0717:564: de ba ra dza ba ra bid twa na ma ra ya ma ra ya hum phat /
NG0717:565: de ba ni ba ra bid tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hum phat /
NG0717:566: de ba ra dza sarba bi twa na ha sa ha sa hum phat /
NG0717:567: d+ha ra d+ha ra hum phat /
NG0717:568: pa shang ku ru pa sham ku ru hum phat /
NG0717:569: om de ba ku la pa ra bi twan mu ru mu ru hum phat /
NG0717:571: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'gyur med rdo rje zhes bya ba stan las langs te /
NG0717:573: lha rnams 'dul ba'i stobs chen po //
NG0717:574: gang phyir thogs med gsang sngags ldan //
NG0717:575: phan thogs sku gsung sna tshogs thugs //
NG0717:576: stong gi bgegs zlog khyod la bstod //
NG0717:578: gang gi 'khor rnams la gzungs 'di sngags pa byed par 'gyur te /
NG0717:579: kye ma gzungs 'di ni mthu dang gzi byin che ba /
NG0717:581: bar du gcod pa dang lha thams cad 'dul bar byed pa /
NG0717:582: dbang phyug chen po dang b+h+rim gi ri ti la
NG0717:583: sogs pas byas pa'i rig sngags thams cad gcod par
NG0717:584: bgyid pa / rig sngags thams cad bzlog par bgyid pa /
NG0717:585: rig sngags thams cad 'gug par bgyid pa /
NG0717:586: lha thams cad kyi snying mnan pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'o //
NG0717:587: de nas 'khor gzhan gyis bstod pa /
NG0717:588: ji ltar shes rab ral gris nyon mongs gcod pa bzhin //
NG0717:589: gdug byed thams cad rab tu grags pa'i sngags kyis gcod par byed //
NG0717:590: lha dang lha las gyur pa'i gdon bzlog thogs pa med //
NG0717:591: yon tan kun ldan gzungs khyod la ni phyag 'tshal bstod //
NG0717:593: de nas byang chub sems dpa' tog brtsegs kyis gsol pa /
NG0717:595: gyi khams 'di na gnod sbyin dang */
NG0717:596: gdon sbyin gyi rigs su gtogs pa 'di lta ste /
NG0717:597: gang po dang mig bzangs la sogs pas sems can rnams la gnod par bgyid /
NG0717:600: srog dang bral bar bgyid na /
NG0717:601: bcom ldan 'das de dag las thar bar mdzad du gsol /
NG0717:602: de skad ces gsol ma thag tu /
NG0717:603: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can /
NG0717:604: rdo rje rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
NG0717:605: gnod sbyin thams cad kyi lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:607: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:608: om na ma sa man+ta ka ya waka tsit+ta badzra
NG0717:609: pa ni ma ha ya k+sha se na pa ti
NG0717:610: badzra kro d+ha ni lam ba ra hum /
NG0717:611: ma ha yak+sha ha na ha na hum phat /
NG0717:612: da ha da ha ma ha yak+sha da ha ni hum phat /
NG0717:613: pa tsa pa tsa yak+sha ra dza pa tsa ni badzra hum phat /
NG0717:614: ma tha ma tha sarba yak+sha ma tha ni badzra hum phat /
NG0717:615: grih+na grih+na yak+sha grih+na ni badzra hum phat /
NG0717:616: yak+sha bid twan ma ra ya ma ra ya hum phat /
NG0717:617: ka ra ka ra bi ka ra yak+sha pho ta ku ru hum phat /
NG0717:619: de nas byang chub sems dpa' tog brtsegs kyis bstod pa /
NG0717:620: gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i skur ston pa /
NG0717:621: gnod sbyin gtso bo gos sngon can //
NG0717:622: gang phyir gnod sbyin 'dul kha'i skur ston pa //
NG0717:623: bde bas brgyan la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NG0717:625: rang gi 'khor rnams la gzungs 'di'i bsngags pa brjod par bgyid de /
NG0717:626: kye ma gzungs 'di ni yon tan thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa /
NG0717:628: gnod sbyin mthu bo che thams cad 'joms par bgyid pa /
NG0717:629: gnod sbyin gyi rigs thams cad tshar gcod par bgyid pa /
NG0717:630: gnod sbyin gyi rig sngags thams cad gcod par bgyid
NG0717:631: pa / gnod sbyin las gyur pa'i gdon thams cad
NG0717:634: de nas de'i 'khor rnams kyis gzungs 'di la bstod pa /
NG0717:635: gang dag gnod sbyin gyi ni nyen gyis zin gyur pa /
NG0717:636: de yi bdag po gsang sngags 'di ni thos pas
NG0717:637: sreg / 'joms pa'i thob zhes su gang gis gsungs
NG0717:638: pa de / ston pa sngags dang bcas pa gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
NG0717:640: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'chi bdag 'joms pa zhes bya ba des /
NG0717:642: kye ma bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams na gshin rje dang *//
NG0717:643: gshin rje las gyur pa'i bgegs thams cad kyis /
NG0717:644: sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog pa /
NG0717:648: srog dang bral bar bgyid na /
NG0717:649: bcom ldan 'das de dag las thar par mdzad du gsol //
NG0717:650: de skad ces gsol ma thag tu /
NG0717:651: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can //
NG0717:652: 'joms pa chen po gshin rje gshed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
NG0717:654: rje thams cad kyi lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang */
NG0717:656: thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo *//
NG0717:657: om sarba ta tha ga ta ka ya wa ka tsit+ta badzra pa ni hum //
NG0717:658: badzra kro d+ha ni lam ba ra ya ma sarba ta ka ban d+ha hum phat /
NG0717:659: om ya ma ka la tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hum phat /
NG0717:660: om ya ma ra dza grih+na grih+na hum phat /
NG0717:661: om ma ha ya ma pa la s+phot s+phot hum phat /
NG0717:662: om ya ma rak+sha tsu ru tsu ru hum phat /
NG0717:663: ya ma bid twan karma rba na hum phat /
NG0717:664: sarba karma ku ru ku ru hum phat /
NG0717:666: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'chi bdag 'joms pa de /
NG0717:667: bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod do //
NG0717:668: bcom ldan rdo rje gos sngon can //
NG0717:669: thams cad gshin rje 'dul ba po //
NG0717:670: gang phyir gshin rje'i gsang 'di bshad /
NG0717:671: gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal bstod /
NG0717:673: 'khor thams cad la gzungs 'di'i bsngags brjod do //
NG0717:674: kye ma gzungs 'di ni 'di ltar mthu che ba /
NG0717:677: bdud kyi dpung rab tu 'joms pa /
NG0717:678: nag po'i gshin rje thams cad gcod pa /
NG0717:679: gshin rje'i rgyal po thams cad 'dzin par byed pa /
NG0717:680: gshin rje stobs che ba thams cad gnon par byed pa /
NG0717:681: gshin rje'i rig sngags thams cad myur du zlog par byed pa yin no //
NG0717:683: de nas 'phags pa'i 'khor na gnas pa rnams kyis bstod pa /
NG0717:684: sems can 'og ma rnams kyis shin tu rtogs dka' ba //
NG0717:685: mkhas pas byang chub chen po'i phyir ni sems bskyed nas /
NG0717:686: gshin rje las na rje las gyur 'byung po bzlog pa'i phyir //
NG0717:687: gsungs pa'i gzungs khyod la ni bdag phyag 'tshal //
NG0717:689: de nas khro bo rnam par rgyal bas gsol ba /
NG0717:690: byang chub chen po thar phyin pas /
NG0717:691: gsungs pa'i gzungs sngags rgyal po 'di //
NG0717:692: bsam gtan 'khor lo dang ldan na //
NG0717:694: gang zhig dpal ldan skur gnas nas /
NG0717:695: bka' bsgo'i don phyir sngags gsungs pa //
NG0717:697: gos sngon rtsa ba'i skur gyur nas //
NG0717:698: rnam par rgyal dang bdud rtsi 'khyil //
NG0717:699: rta mgrin dang ni gshin rje gshed /
NG0717:700: de la sogs pa'i sprul par ldan //
NG0717:701: som nyi yid gnyis ldan pa yis //
NG0717:703: dad pa dam tshig yang dag ldan //
NG0717:704: bla ma la gus mchod la brtson //
NG0717:705: stong pa don la dmigs pa yis //
NG0717:706: bred sha thon nas stong gsum gyi //
NG0717:708: mkha' 'gro dang ni ma mo kun //
NG0717:709: gnod pa gang yang mi byed cing *//
NG0717:710: phan pa chen po sgrub par byed //
NG0717:712: nyes pa kun las rab tu thar //
NG0717:713: legs pa yon tan thams cad thog / drang srong chen po myur du 'grub //
NG0717:714: tshangs pa'i gnas kyang rab tu bsam //
NG0717:715: de ltar gyur na dngos grub 'gyur //
NG0717:717: lag na rdo rje gos sngon @#//
NG0717:719: rdo rje rtse mo'i las kyi gzungs chen po'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ///
NG0717:720: / de nas lha'i bus gsol pa /
NG0717:721: gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i rgyud las /
NG0717:722: don dang yi ge kun 'das don ston pa //
NG0717:723: 'di ni kun gyi thun mong ma yin te /
NG0717:724: / gang zag theg pa chen po'i rigs dang ldan
NG0717:725: // spyod pa'i don la dad pa yang dag skye //
NG0717:726: lus dang srog la bla ma mnyam par bya //
NG0717:727: rtag tu legs pa'i don la spyod //
NG0717:728: brtan pa ma thob kun rdzob chos //
NG0717:729: spyod rdzogs brtan pa thob nas de nyid ngang la gnas //
NG0717:730: dam pa'i chos ston byang chub sems dang ldan //
NG0717:731: nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po bsgom //
NG0717:732: de yi chos bzhin gzhan gyi spyod yul min //
NG0717:733: rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud //
NG0717:734: rtog pa thams cad 'dus pa kun las btus //
NG0717:735: gsang don nye bar 'byed las nyer 'byed rgyud //
NG0717:736: sho lo ka 'bum gyi cha gnyis bka' stsal pa //
NG0717:737: dur khrod phug na bka' rtags phyag rgya btab //
NG0717:738: skal ba med pas su yi spyod yul min //
NG0717:739: bdag gis legs par bsgrubs pa'i byin brlabs kyis //
NG0717:740: rtse mo dum bu'i rgyud 'di dur khrod che //
NG0717:741: gnod sbyin phug nas sems can don du blangs //
NG0717:742: 'di la brten nas gos sngon dngos grub gnyis //
NG0717:743: sems can gyi thob nas bla med byang chub thob //
NG0717:744: a tsar+ya g.yu sgra dpal bzher gyis zhal mnga' nas kyis phyung ba'o //
NG0717:746: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs
